metadata.description:
NFI is a platform that makes it possible for every designer to create Non-Fungible Items powered by blockchain technology. Non-Fungible Items are 3D NFT items that can be integrated into an individual's life on social media and extended reality.

NFI's customisation feature allows minters to customise NFT design according to their own tastes and styles.

Customise your NFI here: [https://www.nfi.io](https://www.nfi.io)

Learn more about how earn as a NFI creator here: [https://www.nfi.io/ndc](https://www.nfi.io/ndc)
